content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's quite close to all important facilities like supermarkets and public transportation. Now, about the rental price, I'm sure we can find a fair deal that suits both of us. Let's discuss it.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's great to hear, Mr. Schmidt. The location of the apartment is very attractive, and I'm sure it will be a comfortable place to live. I'm looking forward to discussing the rental price with you. Could you please share your initial thoughts on the price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Well Mr. Wang, considering the prime location of the apartment, I was thinking of a price of €1200 per month. I'm sure you understand that the city center is a highly desirable location, and this price reflects that.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time and the offer, Mr. Schmidt. I'll need some time to consider the price. Could we continue our discussion later?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Of course, Mr. Wang. Take your time to consider the price. I look forward to hearing back from you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I will get back to you soon. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
